@5kids1condo @martynschmoll and if they can show 30kph limit won't change their stats, they are predisposed to not care.
@5kids1condo @martynschmoll quite. But RCMP's lack of leadership is unsurprising, if people aren't getting hurt it's not their domain +
@martynschmoll @5kids1condo but it says nothing about the quality of life of those who avoid death+injury.
@martynschmoll @5kids1condo basically death+injury rate on North Shore is pretty low, can argue in those cases, speed not a major factor.
@martynschmoll @5kids1condo job-related myopia: they focus only on failures of the system without considering the quality of the "success".
@BeingKulvir great to meet you too - and yes, I hope it's the start of something.
